item.description:
Due to the highly popular Gunstock Aerial Treetop course, we have decided to try another of these meet ups.

This meet up will take place at the Brownstone Exploration & Discovery Park located in Portland, CT.
We have never been to Brownstone Exploration & Discovery Park, but it looks like it is an interesting place to have fun.

Please visit the following website to see if you would like to attend this meet up: http://brownstonepark.com/

We will meet at 9:30 near wherever they sell the admission tickets.

People can either get the General Swimming Daily Pass*
(Swimming, Snorkeling, Kayaking, Hiking and Biking)

Or

the Adventure Sports Daily Pass*
(All the above plus Cliff Jumping, Zip Lines, Waterslide, Rope Swing, Scuba Diving, Inflatable Obstacles)

Or

the Wakeboard Adventure Sports Daily Pass*
(All the above plus Wakeboard Park, including standard board and helmet rental)

Prices are all on line.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at 9:30 near wherever they sell the admission tickets.
item.name: Brownstone Exploration & Discovery Park located in Portland, CT
